definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Made with grapes from the prestigious Maipo Valley, This wine has an intense ruby red colour, and possesses an intense aroma of spices and chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 選用邁坡山谷出產的美樂葡萄釀製而成的這款乾紅。

sentences.english: The content of this programme does not represent the view of Musica Viva Limited.
sentences.chinese: 本節目的內容並不反映非凡美樂的意見。

sentences.english: If you really must have a Merlot, plan to spend more than $20.
sentences.chinese: 若你非買一瓶美樂不可，那你得準備花20美元以上。

sentences.english: Merlot and Syrash is Chateau Lasogity's signature wines.
sentences.chinese: 美樂和西拉是這個酒莊的代表作。

definition: Orchard Road, Singapore (shopping and tourist area)
